1370: Waldrada moved to Muurhuysen1.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Claward at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Claward in 1370 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Cees in 1372 at age 25.
1374: Gave birth to Voghel in 1374 at age 27.
1376: Gave birth to Siwa in 1376 at age 29.
1379: Gave birth to Sophia in 1379 at age 32.
1382: Lost daughter Sophia when Sophia was 4 years old.
1384: Gave birth to Eingeliadis in 1384 at age 37.
1388: Gave birth to Eghenonis in 1388 at age 41.
Lost son Voghel when Voghel was 15 years old.
Lost daughter Eingeliadis when Eingeliadis was 5 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
